src:
Arsene Wenger Sebut Barcelona Kehilangan Karisma, Benarkah?
06 Nov 2019, 13:51 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona hanya mampu bermain imbang 0-0 melawan Slavia Praha di Liga Champions. Hasil tersebut, menurut Arsene Wenger, menjadi bukti bahwa Barcelona mulai kehilangan karisma dan banyak bergantung pada Lionel Messi.
Laga Barcelona vs Slavia Praha di Camp Nou selesai digelar pada Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Barcelona tampil dominan dengan melepas 14 tendangan, tetapi tidak ada yang menjadi gol.
Hasil tersebut dinilai tidak cukup baik untuk tim sekelas Barcelona. Apalagi, Barcelona punya rekor yang sangat bagus saat berjumpa klub asal Republik Ceko, seperti halnya Slavia Praha.
Walaupun, jika melihat klasemen, Barcelona masih berada di posisi yang bagus. Barcelona tetap berada di puncak klasemen Grup F dengan meraih 8 poin. Barcelona unggul satu poin dari Dortmund di posisi kedua.
text:
Arsene Wenger Call Barcelona Losing Charisma, Really?
Nov 6 2019, 13:51 by Bola.net
Barcelona - Barcelona can only draw 0-0 against Slavia Prague in the Champions League. These results, according to Arsene Wenger, are proof that Barcelona is starting to lose charisma and much depends on Lionel Messi.
Barcelona vs Slavia Prague match at Camp Nou finished held on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs. Barcelona appeared dominant by releasing 14 kicks, but no one was scored.
These results are considered not good enough for a class of Barcelona team. Moreover, Barcelona has a very good record when meeting clubs from the Czech Republic, like Slavia Prague.
Although, if you look at the standings, Barcelona is still in a good position. Barcelona remain at the top of Group F with 8 points. Barcelona is one point ahead of Dortmund in second place.
